DOC.brief_title: The Role Rate Force Application Responses Spinal Manipulation Therapy
DOC.detailed_description: Although indirect evidence rate force application modulate neuromuscular response spinal manipulation therapy ( SMT ) peak force thrust duration modulation , assumption remain confirm . Therefore , objective present study determine different SMT force-time profile constant rate force application would maintain ( modulation peak force time peak force ) lead similar neuromechanical response . Based available data relative effect SMT biomechanical parameter modulation , hypothesize neuromuscular response would similar across SMT force-time profile , vertebral displacement would increase SMT peak force increase .
DOC.criteria: Healthy adult Thoracic lumbar pain History back trauma surgery Severe osteoarthritis Inflammatory arthritis Vascular condition Contraindication use SMT
